channel.title: Hi, I'm Rohit!
channel.description: Recent content on Hi, I'm Rohit!

item.title: Timeline
item.description: Resume 2022 MealMe, San Francisco Software Engineering Intern 2021 Product Manager

item.title: About Me
item.description: Finished products are for decadent minds. Bail Channis, Second Foundation Hi, I’m Rohit, a fourth year Computer Science undergrad at the University of Waterloo. Originally, I come from Bangalore, India, informally known as the Silicon Valley of India, and rightly so in my opinion. I witnessed the growth of myriad small businesses1 (into large national and multi-national corporations) throughout my childhood, and thought to myself, “If they can do it, why not me?
